articles.title: Stadia iOS support now possible through browser-based solution - Stevivor

articles.title: An absolutely wild mod has brought real-time ray tracing to the SNES - The Verge
articles.description: Programmer Ben Carter has brought real-time ray tracing, a cutting-edge graphics technology, to the SNES, a 30-year-old console.
articles.content: It offers a new look at a unique art style
